…essential workers, the  majority of whom are women and women of color.

These care workers are certified nursing assistants, home health  aides, personal care attendants, and direct support professionals. They  provide skilled, often medically necessary care, from administering  medication to helping with daily activities like bathing, dressing, and  eating.…

…recognize the outstanding  contributions that Mr. Eric Verosic has made to our community in the  aftermath of Hurricane Milton.
